title: [Gorget Trails, Fissure]
description: Almost no moonlight reaches the bottom of this elbow-bend crevasse, and the rocks are quite cold to the touch.  A broad layer of pink rock travels sinuously along one wall, describing past deformations.  Wedged into the fissure high overhead is a massive boulder, arrested in its fall by the narrowing canyon.
